channel.title: davewiner tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from davewiner.

item.description: BlackRock, Vanguard, and UBS Are Blocking Climate Progress. https://t.co/4U7r0hcB4t
BlackRock's Larry Fink, who oversees $10 trillion, says Russia-Ukraine war is ending globalization. https://t.co/bGEq9lzoh9
@josephzitt That's twitter's schtick.

1/6 Yesterday I wrote a piece that asked a philosophical question. This is how it went. The government can't search you without probable cause, that's in the Constitution. But if you invite someone into your house to visit and they go through your private stuff, that's also
2/6 wrong, even though the Constitution says nothing about it.
3/6 In the same way, you have "free speech," even when it's your employer, school, news org or your family or friends trying to control your speech. The Constitution doesn't prohibit them from doing it, so you don't need to make that much-belabored point.
4/6 Being intolerant of other people's opinions is still, as far as I'm concerned, and many other Americans, of all persuasions, wrong. In America you are free to speak, and it's not just the government that's about, no matter what XKCD says.
5/6 If you punish people for expressing their opinions, you are wrong.
6/6 Even so someone will post that stupid XKCD cartoon about showing you the door. That just proves you're an asshole, although you are certainly entitled to your opinion and I will not try to have you fired. Have a nice day. ğŸ˜€
